title: Old Differences (2C69)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Make an Elf or Dwarf skirmishing a [Moria] Orc strength -1 (or -3 if you spot an Elf and a Dwarf).
Lore:	”'I'll be dead before I see the Ring in the hands of an Elf!'”
Rarity:	C
